primarySegments.name: Aspiring Entrepreneurs
primarySegments.description: Individuals looking to start their own business and need validation for their ideas.

problemsNeeds: Need to validate business ideas before investing
Desire to minimize risk in business ventures
behaviors: Frequently search for business idea validation tools
Use social media to follow business trends

primarySegments.name: Small Business Owners
primarySegments.description: Owners of small businesses seeking to expand or pivot their current offerings.

psychographics: Interested in business growth and innovation
problemsNeeds: Need to identify new market opportunities
Limited resources for extensive market research

primarySegments.name: Corporate Innovators
primarySegments.description: Professionals in large companies tasked with exploring new business opportunities and innovations.

demographics: Advanced degrees in business or technology
psychographics: Interested in corporate innovation and trends
problemsNeeds: Need to validate new business ideas quickly
Pressure to innovate within corporate constraints
